project.description: Triggered by a finished ovoc_server night build and performs: 1. create a tested VM: launch new instance from sanity AMI and get its IP address 2. run python script which ssh to the tested VM and download the latest DVD3.iso 3. tests: install latest official iso, upgrade to latest iso, integration tests 4. python script copies all logs from tested VM to the jenkins slave 5. archive the logs 6.if build passed then terminate the tested machine

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: FullTesting
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: this param is inherited from ovoc build that triggered this sanity build

condition.command: BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [[ "$BRANCH" == "7.4.1000" ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi
BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [[ "$BRANCH" == "7.4.2000" ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi
BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [[ "$BRANCH" == "7.4.3000" ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi
BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [[ "$BRANCH" == "7.6" ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi
BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [[ "$BRANCH" == "7.4" ]]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi

buildStep.command: # if branch is 7.4 then we dont run this step # in branch is higher than 7.4 then we need to arrange the directory EMS/target # so it will contain only the 5 jar files we copied from build-ovoc job archive # and all executables cd EMS chmod 0775 target cp FKGenerator.ini target cd target cp common/target/common-7.*-SNAPSHOT.jar . cp database/target/database-7.*-SNAPSHOT.jar . cp EMS/target/server-7.*-SNAPSHOT.jar . cp oracle_triggers/target/oracle_trigger-7.*-SNAPSHOT.jar . cp rest-core/target/rest-core-7.*-SNAPSHOT.jar . rm -rf common rm -rf EMS rm -rf rest-core rm -rf oracle_triggers rm -rf database rm -rf target chmod 0775 *

condition.command: BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [[ "$BRANCH" == "master" ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
DefaultGateway="172.16.132.1" #1. create a tested VM: launch new instance from sanity AMI and get its IP address emsTestedVM="$(aws ec2 run-instances --image-id ami-ce2b84a1 --instance-market-options MarketType=spot --count 1 --instance-type m4.2xlarge --key-name "Jenkins & App subnets machines key pair" --security-group-ids sg-77bce41e --subnet-id subnet-35295a5c || aws ec2 run-instances --image-id ami-ce2b84a1 --count 1 --instance-type m4.2xlarge --key-name "Jenkins & App subnets machines key pair" --security-group-ids sg-77bce41e --subnet-id subnet-35295a5c)"
#keep instance ID INSTANCE_ID="$(echo "${emsTestedVM}" |grep InstanceId |cut -d '"' -f 4)" #add tag to this instans: "emsSanity" aws ec2 create-tags --resources ${INSTANCE_ID} --tags Key=Name,Value=emsSanityUpgrade #add tag to this instans "Spotinst" aws ec2 create-tags --resources ${INSTANCE_ID} --tags Key=Creator,Value=Spotinst #set to its delete volume when instance will be terminated aws ec2 modify-instance-attribute --instance-id ${INSTANCE_ID} --block-device-mappings "{ \"DeviceName\": \"/dev/sda1\", \"Ebs\": { \"DeleteOnTermination\": true } } " #keep ip address into "vmIP" vmIP="$(echo "${emsTestedVM}" |grep PrivateIpAddress |tail -1 |cut -d '"' -f 4)"
# find what branch is it? BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [ $BRANCH == master ]; then BRANCH="7.4"; fi
echo "INSTANCE_ID=${INSTANCE_ID}" > sanity.properties echo "vmIP=${vmIP}" > sanity2.properties echo "BRANCH=${BRANCH}" > sanity3.properties
#wait for the new machine to come up sleep 300
#find the latest official tag #if the current new ISO is official (ISO_DEPLOY_DESTINATION==official_iso) and (current branch == upgrade_from) #then we need to find not the latest official, but the one before latest. ARTIFACTORY="https://test-artifactory/api/storage/ems-release/com/ac/ems/ovoc_server/$UPGRADE_FROM/official_iso"
###### old code - before sanuty multijob ####### #if [ $ISO_DEPLOY_DESTINATION == latest_iso ]; then #LAST_OFFICIAL="$(curl -k -s -X GET $ARTIFACTORY |grep uri | grep -v artifactory | sort -V | tail -1 | cut -d '"' -f 4 | cut -c 11- | rev | cut -c 5- | rev)" #else #LAST_OFFICIAL="$(curl -k -s -X GET $ARTIFACTORY |grep uri | grep -v artifactory | sort -V | tail -2 | head -1 | cut -d '"' -f 4 | cut -c 11- | rev | cut -c 5- | rev)" #fi ####################################################
if [[ "$ISO_DEPLOY_DESTINATION" == "official_iso" && "$BRANCH" == "$UPGRADE_FROM" ]]; then LAST_OFFICIAL="$(curl -k -s -X GET $ARTIFACTORY |grep uri | grep -v artifactory | sort -V | tail -2 | head -1 | cut -d '"' -f 4 | cut -c 11- | rev | cut -c 5- | rev)" else LAST_OFFICIAL="$(curl -k -s -X GET $ARTIFACTORY |grep uri | grep -v artifactory | sort -V | tail -1 | cut -d '"' -f 4 | cut -c 11- | rev | cut -c 5- | rev)" fi
#2. run python scripts. install, integration tests cd EMS/VersionRelease python2.7 setNetwork.py $vmIP $DefaultGateway #install the latest official #first, check out the tag of the last official that we want to upgrade from if [ $UPGRADE_FROM == "7.4" ]; then FROM="master"; else FROM=$UPGRADE_FROM; fi if [ $BRANCH != $UPGRADE_FROM ]; then git fetch git fetch --tags #git checkout server_$LAST_OFFICIAL git checkout $FROM fi python2.7 SanityInstall.py $LAST_OFFICIAL $vmIP official_iso #upgrade to the latest #first, check out the tag of the latest that we want to upgrade to git checkout server_$NEW_TAG python2.7 SanityInstall.py $NEW_TAG $vmIP $ISO_DEPLOY_DESTINATION
# run sanity tests and log collect if [[ "$BRANCH" == "7.4" || "$BRANCH" == "7.4.1000" || "$BRANCH" == "7.4.2000" ]] then python2.7 SanityTest.py $NEW_TAG $vmIP # run sanity test and copy logs, and if sanity fails then copy logs and exit with error: else python2.7 SanityTest.py $NEW_TAG $vmIP $FullTesting \ && python2.7 SanityCopyLogs.py $NEW_TAG $vmIP \ || { python2.7 SanityCopyLogs.py $NEW_TAG $vmIP \ && exit 1; } fi
#3. if tests pass then terminate the tested machine aws ec2 terminate-instances --instance-ids ${INSTANCE_ID}
